sleep.title: FixSleep
sleep.subtitle: Calculate your sleep cycles for better rest and recovery.

cycles.descriptionSleep: If you go to sleep at {{time}}, try waking up at one of these times.
cycles.descriptionWake: To wake up around {{time}}, try falling asleep at one of these times.

sounds.title: Sounds
sounds.subtitle: Relaxing sounds to help you sleep

card.title: Sleep Time
card.body: Set a bedtime reminder to build a consistent and healthy sleep routine.

card.title: Time to fall asleep
card.body: Set a bedtime reminder to build a consistent and healthy sleep routine.

card.body1: Sleep cycles last about 90 minutes, including stages like light sleep, deep sleep, and REM. These stages help your body recover and process the day.
card.body2: Waking up at the end of a cycle, rather than in the middle, helps you feel more refreshed and alert.
